HoaryFox は簡単に建築構造向け BIM データ \"ST-Bridge\.message: HoaryFox is designed to easily handle "ST-Bridge", BIM data for Japan building structures  in Grasshopper.

Grasshopper の可視化や形状最適化機能を使った構造設計の効率化を目指し.message: We aim to improve the efficiency of structural design using Grasshopper's visualization and shape optimization capabilities.

Grasshopper の構造解析ツール Karamba3D への ST-Bri.message: Supports the input and output of ST-Bridge data to and from Grasshopper's structural analysis tool Karamba3D.
